document.full_text: verizon wireless expects to offer family plans at some point in the future for data services supporting multiple devices including smartphones and tablet computers, according to a top executive of parent company verizon communications.
document.title: verizon eyes family data plans
lines_and_colors: verizon wireless expects to offer family plans at some point in the future for data services supporting multiple devices including smartphones and tablet computers, according to a top executive of parent company verizon communications.
